Class RSAKeyPair

java.lang.Object

public class RSAKeyPair
extends java.lang.Object

RSA Key Pair abstraction, contains both public and private keys

savePKCS12

public void savePKCS12(java.lang.String fileName,
                       java.lang.String keyStorePwd,
                       java.lang.String privKeyPwd,
                       java.security.cert.Certificate[] chain)
                throws CryptoUtilsException
Creates a new PKCS12 file, in which is stored the RSA SubjetsPrivate key protected by PBE and the certificate chain for the corresponding public key

Parameters:
fileName - File name for the pkcs12 file (commonly with extension .p12)
keyStorePwd - Password for the pkcs12 file
privKeyPwd - File for the encrypting the private key
chain - Certificate Chain, must include at least one, containing the subject public key
Throws:
CryptoUtilsException

loadPKCS12

public static java.lang.Object[] loadPKCS12(java.lang.String fileName,
                                            java.lang.String keyStorePwd,
                                            java.lang.String privKeyPwd)
                                     throws CryptoUtilsException
Loads the RSA Key Pair stored in a pkcs12

Parameters:
fileName - File in which are stored the keys
keyStorePwd - PKCS12 File password
privKeyPwd - PrivateKey Password
Returns:
a object array with 2 positions, in the first one the RSAKeyPair stored in the pkcs12 file and in the second one the certificate chain stored in the pkcs12 file
Throws:
CryptoUtilsException

encodePKCS12

public byte[] encodePKCS12(java.lang.String keyStorePwd,
                           java.lang.String privKeyPwd,
                           java.security.cert.Certificate[] chain)
                    throws CryptoUtilsException
Encode the RSAKeyPair as a PKCS12 byte array using base64, in which is stored the RSA SubjetsPrivate key protected by PBE and the certificate chain for the corresponding public key

Parameters:
keyStorePwd - Password for the pkcs12 file
privKeyPwd - File for the encrypting the private key
chain - Certificate Chain, must include at least one, containing the subject public key
Throws:
CryptoUtilsException

decodePKCS12

public static java.lang.Object[] decodePKCS12(byte[] pairBytes,
                                              java.lang.String keyStorePwd,
                                              java.lang.String privKeyPwd)
                                       throws CryptoUtilsException
Decodes a PKCS12 byte array encoded using base64 to an RSAKeyPair object

Parameters:
pairBytes - byte array encoded using base64 which represents the RSAKeyPair
keyStorePwd - PKCS12 File password
privKeyPwd - PrivateKey Password
Returns:
a object array with 2 positions, in the first one the RSAKeyPair stored in the pkcs12 file and in the second one the certificate chain stored in the pkcs12 file
Throws:
CryptoUtilsException
